VIII.iii.9.B.1.b
.
Action to Take When the Veteran Claims Environmental or Military Occupational Hazards Exposure but Does Not Claim a Disability
A claim is not substantially complete if a Veteran alleges exposure to environmental or military occupational hazards during service but does not claim SC for a specific disability.Â  In cases such as these, follow the procedures for handling an incomplete application at
M21-1, Part II, Subpart iii, 1.C.2.b
.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 9, Section B - Processing Claims Based on Exposure to Specific Environmental or Military Occupational Hazards
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iii, Chapter 9, Section B
